Package ohos.net

Class NetManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.net.NetManager

  • public final class NetManager
extends Object
    Provides interfaces to manage and use data networks.

    This class provides interfaces to activate and query data networks and bind NICs to processes, as well as callback interfaces to listen for status changes.

    Since:
    1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int BACKGROUND_POLICY_ALLOWLISTED
      Indicates that only applications in the allowlist can use metered networks.
      static int BACKGROUND_POLICY_DISABLE
      Indicates that applications can use metered networks.
      static int BACKGROUND_POLICY_ENABLED
      Indicates that applications cannot use metered networks.

      • getInstance

        Since:

      • setupSpecificNet

        public boolean setupSpecificNet​(NetSpecifier netSpecifier,
                                NetStatusCallback callback)
        Activates a data network matching NetSpecifier. A network is automatically deactivated when the application exits. It can also be manually deactivated by using removeNetStatusCallback(ohos.net.NetStatusCallback).

        To call this method, you must have the ohos.permission.SET_NETWORK_INFO permission.

        Parameters:
        netSpecifier - Indicates the network specifier. See NetSpecifier.
        callback - Indicates the callback to notify the application of network status changes. For details, see NetStatusCallback.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the network is activated; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • addNetStatusCallback

        public boolean addNetStatusCallback​(NetSpecifier netSpecifier,
                                    NetStatusCallback callback)
        Receives status change notifications of a specified network.

        removeNetStatusCallback(ohos.net.NetStatusCallback) can be used to cancel receiving status change notifications. This method requires the ohos.permission.GET_NETWORK_INFO permission.

        Parameters:
        netSpecifier - Indicates the network specifier. See NetSpecifier.
        callback - Indicates the callback to notify the application of network status changes. For details, see NetStatusCallback.
        Returns:
        Returns true if notifications are received; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • removeNetStatusCallback

        public boolean removeNetStatusCallback​(NetStatusCallback callback)
        Cancels listening for network status changes. If the callback is used by setupSpecificNet(ohos.net.NetSpecifier,ohos.net.NetStatusCallback), network connection will be interrupted.
        Parameters:
        callback - Indicates the callback to cancel. For details, see NetStatusCallback.
        Returns:
        Returns true if listening for network status changes is canceled; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • addDefaultNetStatusCallback

        public boolean addDefaultNetStatusCallback​(NetStatusCallback callback)
        Receives status change notifications of the default data network.

        removeNetStatusCallback(ohos.net.NetStatusCallback) can be used to cancel receiving status change notifications. This method requires the ohos.permission.GET_NETWORK_INFO permission.

        Parameters:
        callback - Indicates the callback to notify the application of network status changes. For details, see NetStatusCallback.
        Returns:
        Returns true if notifications are received; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • getDefaultNet

        public NetHandle getDefaultNet​()
        Obtains the data network that is activated by default.

        To call this method, you must have the ohos.permission.GET_NETWORK_INFO permission.

        Returns:
        Returns the NetHandle object; returns null if the default network is not activated.
        Since:
        1

      • getAllNets

        public NetHandle[] getAllNets​()
        Obtains the list of data networks that are activated.

        To invoke this method, you must have the ohos.permission.GET_NETWORK_INFO permission.

        Returns:
        Returns the NetHandle object; returns null if no network is activated.
        Since:
        1

      • hasDefaultNet

        public boolean hasDefaultNet​()
        Checks whether the default data network is activated.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the default data network is activated; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • getNetCapabilities

        public NetCapabilities getNetCapabilities​(NetHandle handle)
        Obtains NetCapabilities of a NetHandle object.

        To invoke this method, you must have the ohos.permission.GET_NETWORK_INFO permission.

        Parameters:
        handle - Indicates the handle. See NetHandle.
        Returns:
        Returns NetCapabilities; returns null if handle is invalid.
        Since:
        1

      • getDefaultHttpProxy

        public HttpProxy getDefaultHttpProxy​()
        Obtains the default HttpProxy proxy settings.

        If a global proxy is set, the global proxy parameters are returned. If the process is bound to a NetHandle using setAppNet(ohos.net.NetHandle), the NetHandle proxy settings are returned. In other cases, the default proxy settings of NetHandle are returned.

        Returns:
        Returns the proxy settings. For details, see HttpProxy.
        Since:
        1

      • setAppNet

        public boolean setAppNet​(NetHandle netHandle)
        Binds a process to handle.

        All the sockets created from the process will be bound to the handle, and the resolution of all host names will be managed by the handle. You can unbind the process from handle by setting nethanlde to null.

        Parameters:
        netHandle - Indicates the handle. For details, see NetHandle.
        Returns:
        Returns true for success, false for failed.
        Since:
        1

      • getAppNet

        public NetHandle getAppNet​()
        Obtains the NetHandle bound to a process using setAppNet(ohos.net.NetHandle).
        Returns:
        Returns the NetHandle bound to the process; returns null if no NetHandle is bound to the process. For details, see NetHandle.
        Since:
        1

      • isDefaultNetMetered

        public boolean isDefaultNetMetered​()
        Checks whether data traffic usage on the current network is metered.

        To call this method, you must have the ohos.permission.GET_NETWORK_INFO permission.

        Returns:
        Returns true if data traffic usage on the current network is metered; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        2

      • getConnectionProperties

        public ConnectionProperties getConnectionProperties​(NetHandle handle)
        Queries the connection properties of a network.

        This method requires the ohos.permission.GET_NETWORK_INFO permission.

        Parameters:
        handle - Indicates the network to be queried.
        Returns:
        Returns the ConnectionProperties object.
        Since:
        2

      • getBackgroundPolicy

        public int getBackgroundPolicy​()
        Queries the background policy of the current application.
        Returns:
        Returns the background policy of the current application. For details, see BACKGROUND_POLICY_DISABLE.
        Since:
        2

      • sendNetConnectState

        public boolean sendNetConnectState​(NetHandle netHandle,
                                   boolean isConnect)
        Reports the network state.

        Permissions required: SystemPermission.GET_NETWORK_INFO and SystemPermission.INTERNET

        Parameters:
        netHandle - Indicates the network whose state is to be reported. The value nullindicates the current network.
        isConnect - Specifies whether the network is available. The value true indicates that the network is available, and false indicates the opposite.
        Returns:
        Returns true for reporting success, false for failed.
        Since:
        5
